thread.title: Patricia
thread.title_full: Alpha Flight Guru reviewed by Patricia

author: Patricia
title: Patricia
text:
Roman, went above and beyond customer service! He made sure that he got us the best times for our departure, considered our travel/flight experience as painless as possible ...helpful and informative and to top that, found us a good deal for business class. My husband and I will definitely recommend Alpha Flight Guru to our friends!
Thank you, Roman!! Your exemplary customer service is greatly appreciated!
